p: Spermatozoa from the cauda epididymis were released by cutting into 2ml of medium (Hams F10) containing 0.5% bovine serum albumin ( Feng et al., 2001 ). After 5 min of incubation at 37ÂºC (with 5% CO 2), the cauda epididymis sperm reserves were determined using a hemocytometer. Sperm motility was analyzed with a microscope (Leica DM750) and reported as the mean number of motile sperm according to the method developed by the WHO ( WHO, 1999).
